problem.markdown:
>>1. “The rate of change of momentum is proportional to impressed force and takes place in the direction of that force” this is ........<< (x) Newton’s Second law of motion ( ) Newton’s First law of motion ( ) Newton’s Third law of motion
>>2) Bernoulli’s Equation is obtained by integration of ---------------<< ( ) Karman Momentum Equation (x) Euler’s Equation ( ) Continuity Equation
>>3) If the characteristics of flow like velocity, pressure, density etc. at any point do not change with respect to time ,the flow is called as<< (x) Steady Flow ( ) Unsteady Flow ( ) Can not say
>>4) For the flow through pipes, Reynold’s number is less than 2000 the flow is called as<< ( ) Transitional Flow ( ) Turbulent flow (x) Laminar flow
>>5) Reynold’s number is given by a formula<< ( ) (V*l*µ)/ρ (x) (ρ*V*l)/µ ( ) (µ*l*ρ)/V
